title: My client gave me an error and now i cant play
body: my client gave me an error, something about the patch not going through, so i restarted, and it was just a loop of errors. i tried trubleshooting but then it failed aswell, so i decided to re install and now this is all i get, anyone deal with this yet?  http://imgur.com/a/pIZX9

replies.body: This might be related to the patching loop issues we were having overnight and early this morning, but it could also be due to League not having the correct permissions in place. Run through our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that helps.

Had to change my install place(?), not sure what that is called. I had to take the game off my G drive and reinstall it on C drive. I don't want it on C drive. Why is Riot making me change the location of my game?

I did the permissions and it didn't work. I uninstalled after trying everything that I found "helpful" on the boards. I am having to continuously click the retry button. I am now at 12,000 files scanned. I don't have a clue how many files there are. My arm and hand are sore now. If there is anything else I can do, please let me know.
